pullrequest.title: Highlight visuals on align independently of how nested they are, with test

content.raw:
So transparency `t = 0.0` is fully opaque, and `t = 1.0` is fully transparent. When highlighting, it sets `t_{i+1} = (1-t_i) / 2`, then when unhighlighting, it sets `t_{i+1} = |2*t_i - 1|`

These calculations are inverses of each other, but I'm not sure whey they are exactly this way. Some brief comments stating the general behavior (highlight should increase/decrease transparency), and that these equations are inverses of each other and should restore the original transparency if called in alternating fashion (`_highlight = true`, then `_highlight = false`, then true, etc).
